pyramids.plot.PlotUtility.voronoi_plot_2d(vor, ax=None)[source]¶

Plot the given Voronoi diagram in 2-D

vor
: scipy.spatial.Voronoi instance
Diagram to plot
ax
: matplotlib.axes.Axes instance, optional
Axes to plot on
fig
: matplotlib.figure.Figure instance
Figure for the plot

Voronoi

Requires Matplotlib.
